description:
When Jovia reports that her "identity got out back home", Tsukiko`s anger rises with each word.
Resigned, Seina reports and apologizes to Seto.
After that, Seina and his crew, Jovia, and Tsukiko get the order to take over and prepare Tabletop Island.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Like Attracts Like and Becomes More Alike
Rui wa Tomo Yobi: Ake ni Majiwaru
類は友呼び 朱に交わる
